> Sunhawk:  I think I have something.  This place is perfect for a
> sensor.  Should I stay here to help when you bring the equipment or
> come back and get it myself.
>

{Talos}
Mess Hall, Deck 2

Talos was picking up the shattered containers of energon, trying to salvage
what supplies he could when the crackle of a communication buzzed in. The
voice sounded much like Sunhawks' but with the communications system rather
fritzy he couldn't hear the complete message. Tapping the wall communicator
he messaged the bridge, "Talos here, how is repairs coming on the
communications systems up there, try and get the incoming signal from
Sunhawk cleared up."

    Shutting down both comms he went back to work helping to make the mess
hall a place to relax, after todays events he was sure the crew would need
some down time. While he didn't want them too relaxed for when they dealt
with the preds, he didn't want them falling over either.
